Replace.Text: Decipher and access the data sealed in the Zenith Tower. Gives the city a 33% tech boost upon completion and gets 3 random Eurekas [ICON_TechBoosted]
After completion, you will get a flying unit "Eye of Zenith" with the pioneer ability, and permanently provide the city with 10% [ICON_Production] production
Gain an additional 25 points of [ICON_Damaged] life recovery, regardless of whether the operation is performed or not, the life will be restored at the end of the round
Gain a Combat Strength [ICON_Strength] bonus of 25 and a Range [ICON_Range] of 2
Deal full damage to the city defense. Gain 150 AA power and nuke resistance.

The mountains and rivers are shattered, the world collapses, and all the prosperity in the past is just a passing cloud. Girl from the East, the stars bless you, may you carry eternal expectations and rebuild a beautiful world
We've tried so hard to restore the old life in a gentle and harmless way, and now I'm willing to try again

The prism tower hanging high above the clouds in the city center provides the city with the ultimate technological services. Provide 2 amenity [ICON_Amenities] , technology value [ICON_Science] , culture value [ICON_Culture] , faith value [ICON_Faith] , productivity [ICON_Production] , gold coin [ICON_Gold]. Unlocks the items "Access Ancient Data" "Assembling the Eye of Zenith" for the city

Replaces Academy, provides a small domestic trade bonus. For each adjacent federal college, add 3 technology value [ICON_Science]. Whenever a Commonwealth Academy is built, get 1 random Eureka [ICON_TechBoosted]
Unlocked after completing the "Rocket Research" technology, ignores terrain effects on movement [ICON_Movement], can only be seen by adjacent enemies. Has a unique upgrade path
Can only be seen by adjacent enemies

Erika is a unique flying unit when she is the leader, it is used to build cities, but at the cost you cannot produce settlers. Cannot be produced, but get an "Eye of Zenith" [NEWLINE] when establishing the capital or completing the city project "Assembling the Eye of Zenith" [NEWLINE] (This unit and related effects will not take effect when the AI ​​operates this civilization)

The effect of Eureka [ICON_TechBoosted] is increased to 75%, and the construction of wonders is accelerated by 33%. The Great Scientist [ICON_GreatScientist] cannot be recruited. After building a wonder, you will get 2 Eureka [ICON_TechBoosted] of the same era as the wonder (if available). As a price, the scientific value [ICON_Science] you get will be reduced by 20%, and when you are in war, the scientific value [ICON_Science] will be reduced by an additional 30%. Whenever you complete a tech victory prerequisite, get a "wave ambusher" and give all units an upgrade.
The technology "Ocean Home" will be unlocked at the beginning. Harbor City presents Zenith Tower after completion [ICON_Buildings]
Self-healing nanoarmor offers powerful self-healing capabilities

Trying to get a higher [ICON_Science] science value. Likes civilizations with high [ICON_Science] technology and abiding by peaceful civilizations, dislikes civilizations that ignore [ICON_Science] technology.
Very well, we would like to make friends.
Let's make this friend again when the stars are right.
The world is full of wonders, do you want to explore the mysteries of the world with me?
Don't take our easy-going as weakness! I'm not afraid of your bravado!
Even if you are as gentle as me, you will never tolerate your lawlessness, and you are ready to accept the move!
Well... it looks like the world is at stake...
Awesome, come see our amazing Zenith Tower.
Not yet, we have more important things to do.
Hello friends, come and see all kinds of wonderful gadgets that we have brought.
But be careful, everyone is very displeased with your behavior! [NEWLINE] (condemns you)
Hello, this is Erica! I came here with the intention of the stars to work hard for the revival of Al Rasino.
Our research institute is ahead, come and have a look!
Well, we are very interested in your city, can you show us around?
As the stars foretell, you are indeed a wise man!
If you have been so lazy, you can not explore the mysteries of science!
Hmph, you have to pay more attention to your actions in the future!
No, we can't stand your madness anymore!
Now you can travel freely in our city.
Our scientific expedition team wants to use your city, can you?
Get you and your army away from us quickly...

Al Lasino Federation (Allesino Federation), referred to as Aino. The name of the country comes from "Arlatsino" in Chishen language, which means "mysterious place". It is the only human colony on Norfoss. For more than 3,000 years since its birth, Aino has been at war with the planet's native civilization "Sildia".

In 2007, the Ainos deciphered the ancient database left by another star empire (Leoster) that has disappeared. Since then, relying on this ancient artificial intelligence called "Zenis", El Rashino gained the upper hand in the war, and finally forced Sildia to humiliate and sue for peace three years later.

However, precisely because of the leap in science and technology, the rise of intellectuals has greatly liberated people's minds. Finally in 2240, the enlightened people united to overthrow the hereditary rule of the "Supreme King" and established the Republic of El Rasino

In 3050, a full-scale civil war known as the "Western War" broke out, and the six major states (Aihunt, Lodes, Rinhara, Sansiq, Heshengdi, and Taxi) were divided into three factions. . In 3056, the cruel and bloody civil war ended with the disintegration of El Rasino, and four major countries were separated from the former Republic of El Rasino (Eshunt Valca Alliance, Great Northern Republic, Hessian Emperor) Empire, El Rashino Confederacy), and a total of 17 independent city-states, large and small

During the civil war, the Duchy of Tassie, driven by the concept of pacifism, helped countless wounded soldiers and refugees, including the former head of the republic, the dictator Miloka, and his family. It is also because of this that Tassie has justifiably won the title of Aino's orthodoxy, and in 3057, he united with several surrounding city-states to form the Al Lassino Alliance.

Eric Koasian, the adopted daughter of Miloka, the last dictator of the Aino Republic, is currently (--3064) the president of the Aino Federal Academy of Sciences. There are different theories about her true identity, but no one, including herself, really knows where she came from.

In 3027, a carrier spaceship stopped in front of the administrative building of the Republic in San Siq, left a baby and then left quickly. The baby girl was later adopted by Miloka, the leader of the army at the time, and was named Erica, a transliteration of the star god "Erica Xiu" in the legend of Chiyu.

Erica has shown extreme intelligence since she was a child, and at the age of 20, she became the academic dean of San Siq National University. She led the development of a series of space communication projects including ZEEP, which pushed people's exploration of artificial intelligence Zenith to a new depth. At the same time, she also designed a series of planetary weapons that rely on gravity to fly for Rinhara's "Spesino" defense and security department, and made great contributions to the fight against alien invading mechanical life forms called "Aliens". .

After the civil war broke out in 3050, Erika followed her father to take refuge in Taxi at the invitation of the Grand Duke of Tasi, and finally served as the president of the Academy of Sciences of the Aino Federation after the collapse of the Republic, and concurrently served as the chief designer of the military department.
